name: Deploying More Capital
description: The fall of Terra Labs founded by Do Kwon caused a lot of chaos and the crypto space was destabilised for some time as a lot of big VCs got rekted. While some people say he's a good man and that no project is bigger than failing. A lot of people lose their funds and they now see crypto as a Ponzi scheme. We are rising to bring back the good reputation that crypto lost due to the failure of Do Kwon's project.
